website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to dividing a room in an easy, effective way that also looks good, this model is a sound investment that tops its competitors in almost every way.
pros: Heavy-duty, light-filtering material that is very effective at adding privacy
Available in a variety of heights and widths, as well as ample stylish colors
cons: Muslin material is prone to wrinkling

customer_reviews.title: Room Divider Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Product was great, quality of the curtain is wonderful; I was expecting some flimsy cheap material and was blown away by the quality of the curtain. Putting it up was 1, 2, 3; My only downfall is that the width of my room is so long that I have to use the middle bracket and it prevents me from fully opening the curtain. I would suggest that if your room is 15' or longer to get 2 smaller curtains. I wish they made longer lengths also, my floor to ceiling in 10' but you can purchase extension brackets/rings to help.
customer_reviews.author: Brigetjones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful deviders
customer_reviews.text: A great looking product. I used two sets to devide a 10 foot area. We ordered khaki color and it looks great! The parts included were sufficient to install it and packiging was great and secure too.
customer_reviews.author: Yaser Elkhatib

customer_reviews.title: NOT A PURCHASE FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time but it did not come with all the pieces and the pole was shorter than the curtain. I ordered the entire kit because it was shown to come with everything needed to hang this but it did not. I asked for a return. When I received the return label, it was a PICTURE of a return label! I mean why was not the actual label sent? And when I printed the label, it was horrible small. I mean how cheap is that action...a picture of a the label. I am waiting to see if they will correct this.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Winder

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This set is very nice and looks classy...definitely not cheap looking. Easy to set up. Our home is an open floor plan and in the winter it gets cold because we have dogs and the sliding glass doors are constantly being open which lets the heat out and the cold in. This divider sections off the living room with the fireplace so when the rest of the house is frigid, the living room stays cozy. Our electric bill went down this year...very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bobbysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for separating basement rooms.
customer_reviews.text: The rods are extremely sturdy and there are ample extensions and hanging brackets to ensure that it is suitably supported even over longer distances. Curtains are very nice as well, and provide outstanding privacy as used to split a basement into multiple movable sections. Not inexpensive, but very pleased with the quality and generous brackets that make this a easy to hang and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mjh999

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for privacy for a basement bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for privacy for a basement bedroom. I purchased two sizes, the 4'X9" smaller one, and the larger divider 8'X15'. Both had sturdy polls and the curtains were well made. I was able to hang them right out of the package. Any wrinkles that were from the package, came out straight away when hung. I only have a 7' ceiling, so instead of cutting and hemming the material, I just let it pool to the carpet, and it looks really nice. It took minimum effort to hang the curtains and we had a private bedroom in about 15 minutes! I would not hesitate to purchase this solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazka

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. Very easy to install. Use the recommended drill bit size and a hammer to gently pound the mollies in and it goes up quickly and easily. The muslin is light weight, which is a plus...it doesn't put too much strain on the rod or mounting hardware. Exactly what I had hoped and I am very, very pleased :-).
customer_reviews.author: A. E.

customer_reviews.title: Isn't the best but only available in size and price range.
customer_reviews.text: It looks decent, not that shabby. I wish there were more options in color and design etc. but the size I needed this was the only decent option. Both fabric and rod are made of very good quality material and definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased with these curtains
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with these curtains. It was easy to install and was much better quality than I was expecting. I ordered the black and there was no smell as some of the other reviews stated. I would recommend these to anyone who's wanting/needing to divide a room.
customer_reviews.author: T S.

customer_reviews.title: Bit more of a pain than I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: The mounting kit with this was not what I expected. It's intended for ceiling mounting. Had to modify a bit for a wall mount. Worked nicely in a 6ft by 10ft partition.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: We love this curtain
customer_reviews.text: We love this curtain! Lightweight, yet darkens the space divided enough to sleep. It is very easy to install!! We used it to make a spare bedroom for visiting family in the sunken den area off the kitchen. It folds back so nicely and is nearly invisible in the niche that leads into the den, so we will leave it up for the next visitor! Ours did not smell at all as other reviews had reported.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked amazingly and the curtains were super thick and great!
customer_reviews.author: Bebiana Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Serves it purpose but it seems like a lot of weight on the pole especially in ...
customer_reviews.text: Serves it purpose but it seems like a lot of weight on the pole especially in the middle (since the pole is only held from both extremities). The pole can extend quite a bit, which adds flexibility but not sure how sturdy it is. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Very good.  Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked out well for me. Ordered the black. Thought the material was a little thin. You can see through it if the room is well lit on the opposite side. Just don't expect the divider to keep 100 percent of the light out. More like 90%.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schwartzstein

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: a little on the pricey side, the curtain is a shade or 3 off from what i thought it would be. but the lite weight of the curtain works well as i could not use the hardware from the ceiling due to the dropped ceilings. so I have it attached from wall to wall. looks nice. does the job
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: It is made of good quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to use as a privacy curtain to divide a room. It is made of good quality fabric.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: For those that want to close themselves off from the world around them...
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to mount, the curtains are heavy duty enough that they hang well and block quite a bit of sound. Keeps my office a little bit more closed off.
customer_reviews.author: Ender42

customer_reviews.title: Was nice heavy material
customer_reviews.text: Was nice heavy material, and looks good on doorway that I can't put actually put a door on. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: vicki young

customer_reviews.title: works great. The black curtain is a great thickness
customer_reviews.text: We use this to divide a larger room into a smaller area for our oldest child to have some privacy, works great. The black curtain is a great thickness. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Hills

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but the curtains were very long, great if you don't have a furry dog.
customer_reviews.author: Bitsy_Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: not so pleased...
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks much nicer than it really is. The description says mocha colored and I rec'd a olive green/taupe looking curtain. I would have prefered mocha but it'll have to do since i'm about to give birth and don't want to deal with returning it. otherwise the quality is okay. It's not a very thick curtain if that's what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, received quickly and provides privacy! Looks wonderful and was easy to install. I recommend this room divider and I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really a simple fix to providing my son more privacy in his bedroom / our shared office space.
customer_reviews.author: D. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Plenty of hardware. Even more hangers & poles included than needed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The curtains are a nice heavy material that light block. The curtain rod is sturdy and with a sleek design. The product was delivered on time and comes packed very well. This is my second purchase from RoomDividersNow and I highly recommend their room solutions.
customer_reviews.author: John Knapp

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the material was good. Instructions were easy to read
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material was good. Instructions were easy to read. The color was right on. If I needed another would once again order one. Overall a excellent expererance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. We use it so close off a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. We use it so close off a room for our daughter to sleep and it works really well. My only issue is that the anchers that come with the set are not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: meir p.

customer_reviews.title: I like the quality of every
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed, I like the quality of every thing
customer_reviews.author: Pedro G. Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dividing my apt for more privacy. Very strong curtain rod and nice lightweight curtain material makes for a perfect combo. I'm very satisfied with my purchase. And you will be too!
customer_reviews.author: Ceruleandrms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and service, recommended , wish I had shorted hangers .
customer_reviews.author: Yngtyler

customer_reviews.title: Simply an excellent and elegant way to separate space
customer_reviews.text: Simply an excellent and elegant way to separate space. It came with its own hardware, so was easy for workman to put up. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: mypal

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, like it, but I am sending it back. no problem with the product, just went a different route. Would recommend.....
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for the price you pay. I'm very pleased with the product that I received and would purchase more of their product again!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our living room to seperate the kitchen from the living room. So far, so good. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rexeken

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great curtains and rods very nice quality and easy to install. I did have to shorten the curtains to the height I wanted them. Overall a very good experience with this seller!
customer_reviews.author: David Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Works but smells
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. WARNING: if you are very sensitive to smells the black curtain had a smell like a b/w photo developer chemicals. It was really strong so we had to wash it twice at a laundromat. Had to knock off 2 stars but other than that it works.
customer_reviews.author: puey

customer_reviews.title: It's OK. I'm now using it.
customer_reviews.text: If you really need to separate a room, you can use it........It's really very long. But not very beautiful. I couldn't find another curtain have that length.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Wang

customer_reviews.title: Room dividers are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Excellent quality. Easy to install. Would order again. The fabric is heavy and well sewn. Would order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Loree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, and works exactly as I expected. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bilardi

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to install and high quality material
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to install and high quality material. Exactly what I was looking for: a room divider that is efficient and elegant at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Helene Visentin

customer_reviews.title: They look very nice. The gray color was a very nice shade ...
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice. The gray color was a very nice shade of gray.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: The curtain arrived just as advertised. It is long and wide enough to block off a space for my son to have a room in the garage. It was pretty easy to hang and looks nice. It gives the privacy that he needed.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Like but color is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the room dividers and the installation was very easy. My biggest disappointment was that the color was not as pictured. The Khaki is really a brown with a hint of green. My first impression was Army green. I put these in my basement so the color wasn't enough to make me return them (I bought 2). Also, I highly recommend washing the curtains before hanging. The dyes have a strong smell, but washing them fixed that very easily.
customer_reviews.author: RLoves2Read

customer_reviews.title: exactly what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Love the curtains and the rods to install the curtains. I got it in white, makes my apt look great! The curtains are thick.
customer_reviews.author: shanon

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get the smell out and this is a problem because I'm using it in my skin care studio where everything is supposed to sme
customer_reviews.text: A couple problems: #1 the muslin curtain is so stinky! I cannot get the smell out and this is a problem because I'm using it in my skin care studio where everything is supposed to smell good! #2- the ceiling mounts are so short that the top of the curtain barely clears the ceiling so it hangs up on the rod when you pull it across. The concept is good but it needs to come with adjustable ceiling mounts for sure. Also, the curtain is so heavy and huge that it is practically impossible to iron all the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen parker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordering was confusing. I was expecting to get the tension rod. However I made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Devon McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Received order promptly and am completely satisfied. Would give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Received order promptly and am completely satisfied. Would give 5 stars; however, instructions could be better on how to assemble longer tensions rods.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lowman

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: This curtain does a satisfactory job as a room divider. Although it's not entirely opaque, it's close enough to provide privacy. The color is lighter that in the picture -- more tan than mocha.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Wright

customer_reviews.title: THAT'S WHAT I WANT
customer_reviews.text: THE SIZE FIT PERFECTLY FOR MY LIVING ROOM. IT ALSO KEEPS WARM. THE COLOR HAS A LITTILE GREENISH, BUT STILL LOOK GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Lu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous quality. The only problem I had with the 8X15 fabric divider was I had to order a second rod with brackets. I would have like to have known this prior to ordering it initially. Otherwise, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Loree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to separate a room and it does the perfect job without putting up a wall. I would recommend this to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Marek

customer_reviews.title: Wash it first
customer_reviews.text: Good... but wash the cloth first before using. Probably because of the chemical they used or because it was stored for a long time. I already installed it but I could not stand the smell so I uninstalled and washed it then.
customer_reviews.author: Rtuaz2000

customer_reviews.title: I order a mirror for the drivers side and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I order a mirror for the drivers side and I got for the passenger side, I used anyways, i Have to order again for the drivers side.
customer_reviews.author: felipe

product_meta.title: RoomDividersNow Muslin Hanging Room Divider Kit - XX-Large A, 8ft Tall x 16ft - 19ft Wide (Khaki)
product_meta.description:
Size:XX-Large A - 8' Tall x 16' to 19' Wide| Color:KhakiLooking for a great way to divide a room, create privacy, or hide clutter? RoomDividersNow Muslin Hanging Room Divider Kits present a creative and stylish way to divide space in minutes. Hanging Room Divider Kits come with everything needed to create and separate your space with ease! 

DIVIDE and CONQUER both small and large spaces with ease:

 * Shared Bedroom

 * Studio Apartment

 * Dorm

 * Workspace

 * Create the perfect amount of privacy, hide clutter, separate functions, reduce sunlight, etc. 

 Quality Construction: 

 * XX-Large "A" Hanging Room Divider Kits (for spaces 16ft - 19ft wide) include two 8ft tall x 15ft wide muslin curtain room dividers and adjustable hanging rods with brackets for ceiling mount 

 * Please note: Middle support brackets are supplied for "Size: XX-Large" kits. Dividers can be pulled back to each side of the room when open and will meet at the bracket in the middle when closed.

 * Hanging rods are built to be easily combined together to reach longer lengths.

 * Dividers are made from high quality 100% hand-dyed cotton muslin fabric

 * Dividers are hemmed and finished on all sides (Non-Flame Retardant)

 * Dividers contain large 1 1/2in metal grommet rings

 * Please note, if a light is shining directly on the divider there can be a small amount of light that filters through

 * For maximum light reduction - please see our Premium Heavyweight Room Divider selection within our product catalog. 

 * Hanging rods measure 1 inch in diameter 

 * Support brackets are adjustable from 4in to 6in in length 

 * Detailed installation instructions come with each kit
feature_bullets: UNIQUE ROOM DIVIDER SOLUTIONS – Attractive, inexpensive, & easily installed
EASY TO SETUP – Kits come with everything needed to divide and conquer your space in minutes
FIX A PROBLEM SPACE – Shared bedroom, apartment, dorm, city loft, workspace, basement, etc.
CREATE PRIVACY – XX-Large kits create and separate space from 16ft to 19ft wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
